***I first imported the website Baseball Almanac's data.***

```{r}
library(rvest)
url <- "https://www.baseball-almanac.com/hof/hofmem3.shtml"
html <- read_html(url)
html
```


***Next I converted to a table and fixed the column names and made the % variable a double.***

```{r}
tables <- html %>% html_table(fill=TRUE)
write.csv(tables[[1]], "temp.csv", row.names=FALSE)
backin <- readr::read_csv("temp.csv", skip = 2, show_col_types =FALSE)
backin$`%` <- parse_number(backin$`%`)
head(backin)
```
